list.name: EPAM Systems
description: EPAM Systems, Inc. is an American company that specializes in product development, digital platform engineering, and digital and product design. The world's largest manufacturer of custom software, consulting specialist, resident of the Belarus High Technologies Park. The company's headquarters is located in Newtown, Pennsylvania, and its branches are represented in more than 30 countries of the world

list.name: The Rolling Scopes School (Node.js)
description: RS School the free courses conducted by The Rolling Scopes developer community since 2013. Developers from different companies and countries participate in the training.
